section.title: Documentation changelog
section.paragraph: The documentation is continually being improved. New releases include new pages, fixes and updates to existing pages, and many updates to the class reference. Below is a list of new pages added since version 3.0.

note.paragraph: This document only contains new pages, so not all changes are reflected. Many pages have been substantially updated but are not reflected in this document.

reference.inline: Using the engine compilation configuration editor

list_item.paragraph: GDScript warning system (split from Static typing in GDScript)

reference.inline: Sync the gameplay with audio and music
When to use scenes versus scripts
When and how to avoid using nodes for everything
Animating thousands of fish with MultiMeshInstance3D

Custom HTML page for Web export
Fixing jitter, stutter and input lag
